title: IP + Patent Drafting
description: A workflow for prior-art review, claim drafting support, and internal review notes.
checklist: Define invention summary and distinguishing features
Perform prior-art scan and record key similarities/differences
Draft claim outline and supporting specification sections
Create an internal review memo with risks and open questions
risk_notes: Treat invention details as sensitive; avoid consumer tools for confidential disclosures.
Keep a record of sources and dates for prior-art references.
